subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Juventus, the Serie A champion, added the Italian Cup title to its trophy case with a win at Lazio in extra time, with Alessandro Matri scoring in the 97th minute.
snippet: Juventus, the Serie A champion, added the Italian Cup title to its trophy case with a win at Lazio in extra time, with Alessandro Matri scoring in the 97th minute.
